response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and expectations. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's an investment in enhancing your experience and productivity. Given its high value and quality, I propose a price of $10,000 for you to consider. This offer allows you to benefit from the full potential of the product while ensuring a fair return on my part. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this proposal.", "product_price": 10000}
